text: Ezɨ 5plan gumazir ghua Laisɨn nguazim moga an ganiziba, kamaghɨn uan adaraziv gei, “Ia kamaghɨn fo, dɨpenir kabar aven, ofa gamir gumazibar korotiar mam ko, asebar ifongiam gɨfofoghamin marvir guar dozir maba ko, marvir guar me tememɨn dɨkɨrigha silvan noghezir mam ko, marvir guar me silvan kɨnimɨn ingarizir mam, da iti. Ezɨ e datɨrɨghɨn manmaghɨn damuam?”
